name: Survive (itch) (AlexAnimateYT)
description:
This is a game for the Beginners Circle Jam #3 jam
This is the first game jam I took part in and it was really fun

The game is about a little space man trying to kill off all the aliens and stay alive. But what he doesn't know is that they just keep coming there is no end...

I hope you enjoy playing this game it was a blast to make.
